idsDocument.name: SubscriberForCoverage
idsDocument.elementOrder: SubscriberName, CoverageNumber, GroupNumber, EmploymentDate, ApplicationDate, SocialSecurityNumber, MaritalStatus, EmployerId, EmployerIdComment, UsCitizen, Race, BirthDate, Gender, SubscriberAddress, PhoneNumber, WorkPhoneNumber, FaxNumber, RelationshipToGuarantor, SubscriberEmployments, CoverageRecord

changeLog.change: Removed any references to SourceCode and replaced with SourceCode
Added SourceStatusCode to instance and collection items.

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: ExtendedAttributes, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsDocument.documentation: Use this structure to feed Subscriber for Coverage information.

group.name: SubscriberName
group.elementOrder: FullName, Prefix, FirstName, MiddleName, LastName, Suffix, Title, Degree
group.documentation: The name of the subscriber for the coverage.

element.name: FullName
element.documentation: Specify full name of patient. If this field is used then do not use the component fields.

element.name: Prefix
element.documentation: Used to specify a name prefix (e.g., Dr.).

element.name: FirstName
element.documentation: Use this element to specify the first name

element.name: MiddleName
element.documentation: Use this element to specify the middle name or intial.

element.name: LastName
element.documentation: Use this element to specify the last name.

element.name: Suffix
element.documentation: Used to specify a name suffix (e.g., Jr. or III).

element.name: Title
element.documentation: Use this element to specify the title the person holds.

element.name: Degree
element.documentation: Use this field to specify the degree the person holds.

element.name: CoverageNumber
element.documentation: The identification number assigned to the subscriber for the coverage. When the subscriber is also a member on the coverage, this is the same as the subscriber's member number. This column may be hidden if you have elected to use enterprise reporting's security utility.

element.name: GroupNumber
element.documentation: The identification number assigned to this subscriber's employer/plan group by the payer. This number will appear in box 11 of the HCFA claim form.

element.name: EmploymentDate
element.documentation: The date on which the subscriber began working for the employer associated with the employer group.

element.name: ApplicationDate
element.documentation: The date on which the subscriber applied for coverage.

element.name: SocialSecurityNumber
element.documentation: The SSN number of the subscriber on a coverage

element.name: MaritalStatus
element.documentation: The marital status of the subscriber.

element.name: EmployerId
element.documentation: This is the unique ID of the employer of the patient subscribing to the coverage if EAF 6410 is set to 1. This is free text if EAF 6410 is set to 2.

element.name: EmployerIdComment
element.documentation: A free text comment that can be entered when the value that is considered to be "Other" is selected as the employer. This option is available only if your organization has chosen to link the subscriber employer to the Employer (EEP) master file in the Facility Profile.

element.name: UsCitizen
element.documentation: Indicates whether the subscriber is a U.S. citizen.

element.name: Race
element.documentation: The race of the subscriber.

element.name: BirthDate
element.documentation: The date of birth for the subscriber on the coverage.

element.name: Gender
element.documentation: The sex of the subscriber of coverage.

group.name: SubscriberAddress
group.elementOrder: AddressLine1, AddressLine2, AddressLine3, AddressLine4, City, StateProvince, PostalCode, CountyRegion, District, Country
group.documentation: Collection used for communicating the Subscriber Address.

element.name: AddressLine1
element.documentation: The street address, line 1 of the subscriber address.

element.name: AddressLine2
element.documentation: The street address, line 2 of the subscriber address.

element.name: AddressLine3
element.documentation: The street address, line 3 of the subscriber address.

element.name: AddressLine4
element.documentation: The street address, line 4 of the subscriber address.

element.name: City
element.documentation: The city of the subscriber address.

element.name: StateProvince
element.documentation: The state of the subscriber address.

element.name: PostalCode
element.documentation: The state of the subscriber address.

element.name: CountyRegion
element.documentation: The County or Region of the subscriber address.

element.name: District
element.documentation: The district of the subscriber address.

element.name: Country
element.documentation: The Country of the subscriber address.

element.name: PhoneNumber
element.documentation: The phone number for the subscriber on the coverage.

element.name: WorkPhoneNumber
element.documentation: The work phone number for the subscriber on the coverage.

element.name: FaxNumber
element.documentation: The fax number for the subscriber on the coverage.

element.name: RelationshipToGuarantor
element.documentation: The category number for the subscriber's relationship to the guarantor.

element.name: CoverageRecord
element.documentation: Subscriber for Coverage information.

idsSpecification.name: CoverageRecord
idsSpecification.elementOrder: StatusCategoryNumber, RetroAdjudicationQueue, CopayInformation, DeductibleMet, ProviderAssignmentCoverageAssigned, SignatureOnFileDate, SignatureOnFileLocation, MedigapAuthorization, TplResource, ThirdParyLiability, CoverageBenefit, SubscriberEmployerFax, SubscriberEmployerId, SubscriberOccupation, SubscriberRetireDate, SubscriberSpouseRetireDate, ScheduledDiscontinueDate, ScheduledActivationDate, VerificationOfCoverage, YearlyAllowedDollarTotal, YearlyAllowedDollarUsed, OrganizationNameForSubmittedClaim, FinancialClass, CoverageFax, FreeTextPlanName, FreeTextPayerName, CoverageCopySource, FreeTextPlanFormat, TefraPatient, AdmissionSource, FederalEmploymentProgramEnrollment, GroupNumber, HmoSiteNumber, HmoPhoneNumber, AlternateSubscriberBillingName, CopayAmount, ChampusSubscriberStatus, ChampusSponsorMilitaryStatus, ChampusSubscriberMilitaryServiceBranch, ChampusSponsorMilitaryServiceBranch, ChampusSponsorMilitaryPayGrade, MedicareOtherInsuranceCompany, MedicareReceivingDisability, DisabilityCoverageFromEmployer, MedicareEmployerOver100Employees, MedicareAutoAccident, MedicareLiabilityAccident, MedicareWorkersComp, MedicareNonAutoAccident, MedicareBlackLung, MedicareVa, MedicarePatientEmployed, MedicareEnrolledHmo, MedicareCoveredByGroupHealthPlan, MedicareEmployerOver20Employees, MedicareRenalDialysis, MedicareRenalDialysisFirst18Months, MedicareHomeDialysisPatient, MedicareSelfAdministeredEpo, MedicareDisability, MedicareSpouseRetired, MedicareSpouseRetireDate, MedicareInsuredByEmployer, MedicarePatientRetired, MedicarePatientRetireDate, MedicareFamilyMemberEmployed, MedicareOtherCoverage, MedicareSpouseEmployed, MedicareCoveredBySpouseEmployer, EvsVerification, EvsVerificationDate, CoveragePayerName, CoveragePayerCity, SubscriberBankingId, CoveragePayer, MemberCoverageRecords

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: ExtendedAttributes, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsSpecification.documentation: Use this structure to feed Subscriber for Coverage information.

element.name: StatusCategoryNumber
element.documentation: The category number of the status for this coverage record.

element.name: RetroAdjudicationQueue
element.documentation: The retroadjudication queue flag for the coverage. Indicates if the coverage should be queued for retroadjudication from self-pay to insurance.

element.name: CopayInformation
element.documentation: Notes regarding copay information for this coverage.

element.name: DeductibleMet
element.documentation: Indicates whether the deductible has been met for this coverage. The deductible can be established on the guarantor account or patient level.

element.name: ProviderAssignmentCoverageAssigned
element.documentation: Indicated whether the provider's assignment status is set to Coverage Assignment for this coverage's payer.

element.name: SignatureOnFileDate
element.documentation: The date when the signature was filed.

element.name: SignatureOnFileLocation
element.documentation: The location at which the signature was filed.

element.name: MedigapAuthorization
element.documentation: Indicates whether the payer for this coverage has Medigap authorization.

element.name: TplResource
element.documentation: The TPL Resource Code for the Illinois Department of Public Aid claims. This code must be a three-digit number. If entered, it will appear in record DA0-08.0 of the ILDPA electronic claim file.

element.name: ThirdParyLiability
element.documentation: Indicates if there is third-party liability for this coverage.

element.name: CoverageBenefit
element.documentation: The benefit code for this coverage. This can contain any facility-specific benefit code.

element.name: SubscriberEmployerFax
element.documentation: The fax number of the coverage subscriber's employer.

element.name: SubscriberEmployerId
element.documentation: The coverage subscriber's employee ID number.

element.name: SubscriberOccupation
element.documentation: The coverage subscriber's occupation.

element.name: SubscriberRetireDate
element.documentation: The date when the coverage subscriber retired.

element.name: SubscriberSpouseRetireDate
element.documentation: The date when the coverage subscriber's spouse retired.

element.name: ScheduledDiscontinueDate
element.documentation: The date when the coverage is scheduled to be discontinued.

element.name: ScheduledActivationDate
element.documentation: The date when the coverage is scheduled to be activated.

element.name: VerificationOfCoverage
element.documentation: Indicates whether the system should prompt for verification of the coverage.

element.name: YearlyAllowedDollarTotal
element.documentation: The yearly dollar limit for payments against this coverage's payer.

element.name: YearlyAllowedDollarUsed
element.documentation: The year-to-date payments made against the coverage's payer.

element.name: OrganizationNameForSubmittedClaim
element.documentation: The title or name of the organization to which submitted claims under this coverage will be sent.

element.name: FinancialClass
element.documentation: The financial class for this coverage.

element.name: CoverageFax
element.documentation: The fax number for this coverage.

element.name: FreeTextPlanName
element.documentation: The free-text plan name for this coverage.

element.name: FreeTextPayerName
element.documentation: The free-text payer name for this coverage.

element.name: CoverageCopySource
element.documentation: The ID of the coverage from which this coverage was copied.

element.name: FreeTextPlanFormat
element.documentation: The format of the coverage's free-text plan.

element.name: TefraPatient
element.documentation: Indicates whether the patient is TEFRA. A patient is TEFRA if an eligibile Medicare beneficiary is covered by a group health plan.

element.name: AdmissionSource
element.documentation: The category number of the admission source.

element.name: FederalEmploymentProgramEnrollment
element.documentation: The Federal Employment Program enrollment code.

element.name: GroupNumber
element.documentation: The group number for the coverage.

element.name: HmoSiteNumber
element.documentation: The site number for the coverage's HMO.

element.name: HmoPhoneNumber
element.documentation: The phone number for the coverage's HMO.

element.name: AlternateSubscriberBillingName
element.documentation: The alternate billing name for the coverage subscriber.

element.name: CopayAmount
element.documentation: The copay amount for the coverage.

element.name: ChampusSubscriberStatus
element.documentation: The CHAMPUS/Tricare subscriber status.

element.name: ChampusSponsorMilitaryStatus
element.documentation: The CHAMPUS/Tricare sponsor's military status, obtained from the military identification card.

element.name: ChampusSubscriberMilitaryServiceBranch
element.documentation: The military service branch for a CHAMPUS/Tricare coverage subscriber.

element.name: ChampusSponsorMilitaryServiceBranch
element.documentation: A CHAMPUS/Tricare coverage sponsor's military service branch.

element.name: ChampusSponsorMilitaryPayGrade
element.documentation: A CHAMPUS/Tricare coverage sponsor's military pay grade.

element.name: MedicareOtherInsuranceCompany
element.documentation: An additional insurance company providing coverage for a Medicare patient.

element.name: MedicareReceivingDisability
element.documentation: Indicates if a Medicare patient is receiving disability benefit.

element.name: DisabilityCoverageFromEmployer
element.documentation: Indicates if a Medicare patient is receiving disability coverage from their employer.

element.name: MedicareEmployerOver100Employees
element.documentation: Indicates if a Medicare employer has over 100 employees.

element.name: MedicareAutoAccident
element.documentation: Indicates if the illness or injury for this visit is due to an automobile accident.

element.name: MedicareLiabilityAccident
element.documentation: Indicates if the illness or injury for this visit is due to a liability accident.

element.name: MedicareWorkersComp
element.documentation: Indicates if a Medicare visit is covered by Workman's Compensation.

element.name: MedicareNonAutoAccident
element.documentation: Indicates if the patient's visit is due to an accident not involving automobiles.

element.name: MedicareBlackLung
element.documentation: Indicates whether the illness is coveraged by the Black Lung program.

element.name: MedicareVa
element.documentation: Indicates if the illness is covered by a Veterans' Administration program.

element.name: MedicarePatientEmployed
element.documentation: Indicates whether the Medicare patient is employed.

element.name: MedicareEnrolledHmo
element.documentation: Indicates if the Medicare patient is enrolled in an HMO.

element.name: MedicareCoveredByGroupHealthPlan
element.documentation: Indicates whether the patient is covered by an employer group health plan.

element.name: MedicareEmployerOver20Employees
element.documentation: Indicates whether the Medicare patient is employed by an employer with over 20 employees.

element.name: MedicareRenalDialysis
element.documentation: Indicates whether the patient is a renal dialysis patient in the first 12 months of entitlement.

element.name: MedicareRenalDialysisFirst18Months
element.documentation: Indicates whether the patient is in the first 18 months of entitlement for renal dialysis.

element.name: MedicareHomeDialysisPatient
element.documentation: Indicates whether the patient is a home dialysis patient.

element.name: MedicareSelfAdministeredEpo
element.documentation: Indicates whether the patient is a home dialysis patient.

element.name: MedicareDisability
element.documentation: Indicates whether a patient's Medicare coverage is due to disability.

element.name: MedicareSpouseRetired
element.documentation: Indicates whether a Medicare patient's spouse is retired.

element.name: MedicareSpouseRetireDate
element.documentation: The date when a Medicare patient's spouse retired.

element.name: MedicareInsuredByEmployer
element.documentation: Indicates whether a Medicare patient is insured by their employer.

element.name: MedicarePatientRetired
element.documentation: Indicates whether a Medicare patient is retired.

element.name: MedicarePatientRetireDate
element.documentation: The date when a Medicare patient's spouse retired.

element.name: MedicareFamilyMemberEmployed
element.documentation: Indicates whether a Medicare patient's spouse or another family member is employed.

element.name: MedicareOtherCoverage
element.documentation: Indicates whether a Medicare patient is covered because of their spouse or other family member.

element.name: MedicareSpouseEmployed
element.documentation: Indicates whether a Medicare patient's spouse is employed.

element.name: MedicareCoveredBySpouseEmployer
element.documentation: Indicates whether a Medicare patient is covered through their spouse's employer group health plan.

element.name: EvsVerification
element.documentation: Indicates whether verification is done through EVS.

element.name: EvsVerificationDate
element.documentation: The date when eligibility was verified with EVS.

element.name: CoveragePayerName
element.documentation: The coverage payer's name.

element.name: CoveragePayerCity
element.documentation: The coverage payer's city.

element.name: SubscriberBankingId
element.documentation: Banking details of the subscriber.

element.name: CoveragePayer
element.documentation: Subscriber for Coverage Payer information.

idsSpecification.name: CoveragePayer
idsSpecification.elementOrder: PayerAddress, PayerPhoneNumber, PayerClaimOfficeNumber, ReferringPhysicianName, ReferringPhysicianAddress, AuthorizationNumber, AuthorizationDateTime, AuthorizingPerson, AuthorizationVerificationDateTime, MedicalAssistanceCardNumber, MedicalAssistance, MedicalAssistanceStatus, MedicalAssistanceCoverage, VaProgram, LastCoverageUpdateDateTime, ManagedCareProgram, ManagedCarePrimaryProvider, ManagedCareAuthorizationNumber, ManagedCareAuthorizationPhoneNumber, CoverageType, CoverageSubscriberHasMedicare, MajorMedicalCoverage, MedicaidGroupNumberSuffix, ChampusTricareRank, ChampusTricareGrade, BlueCrossBlueShieldContractAccountName, PrimaryProviderPhoneNumber, PrimaryProviderAuthorizationContactPerson, PrimaryProviderAuthorizationForVisit, AuthorizationComments, PmpAuthorizationForVisit, AuthorizationEntryPerson, ManagedCareRrSubscriberNumber, ReciprocityNumber, TherapyType, TherapyPlanDate, TherapyStartDate, LastMenstrualDate, AuthorizationValidDate, AuthorizationInvalidDate, CommercialAuthorizationNumber, CommercialAuthorizationPerson, ManagedCareCobraStatus, ManagedCareCobraStatusDate, PremiumBillingAccountCreated, AlternateCoverageOrganization, AlternateCoverageAddress, GroupCopayDocument

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: ExtendedAttributes, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsSpecification.documentation: Use this structure to feed Subscriber for Coverage information.

group.name: PayerAddress
group.elementOrder: AddressLine1, AddressLine2, AddressLine3, AddressLine4, City, StateProvince, PostalCode, CountyRegion, District, Country
group.documentation: Collection used for communicating the payer address.

element.name: AddressLine1
element.documentation: The street address, line 1 of the payer address.

element.name: AddressLine2
element.documentation: The street address, line 2 of the payer address.

element.name: AddressLine3
element.documentation: The street address, line 3 of the payer address.

element.name: AddressLine4
element.documentation: The street address, line 4 of the payer address.

element.name: City
element.documentation: The city of the payer address.

element.name: StateProvince
element.documentation: The state of the payer address.

element.name: PostalCode
element.documentation: The state of the payer address.

element.name: CountyRegion
element.documentation: The County or Region of the payer address.

element.name: District
element.documentation: The district of the payer address.

element.name: Country
element.documentation: The Country of the payer address.

element.name: PayerPhoneNumber
element.documentation: The phone number of the coverage payer.

element.name: PayerClaimOfficeNumber
element.documentation: The claim office number of the coverage payer.

group.name: ReferringPhysicianName
group.elementOrder: FullName, Prefix, FirstName, MiddleName, LastName, Suffix, Title, Degree
group.documentation: The name of the HMO's referring physician.

element.name: FullName
element.documentation: Specify full name of patient. If this field is used then do not use the component fields.

element.name: Prefix
element.documentation: Used to specify a name prefix (e.g., Dr.).

element.name: FirstName
element.documentation: Use this element to specify the first name

element.name: MiddleName
element.documentation: Use this element to specify the middle name or intial.

element.name: LastName
element.documentation: Use this element to specify the last name.

element.name: Suffix
element.documentation: Used to specify a name suffix (e.g., Jr. or III).

element.name: Title
element.documentation: Use this element to specify the title the person holds.

element.name: Degree
element.documentation: Use this field to specify the degree the person holds.

group.name: ReferringPhysicianAddress
group.elementOrder: AddressLine1, AddressLine2, AddressLine3, AddressLine4, City, StateProvince, PostalCode, CountyRegion, District, Country
group.documentation: Collection used for communicating the referring physician address.

element.name: AddressLine1
element.documentation: The street address, line 1 of the referring physician address.

element.name: AddressLine2
element.documentation: The street address, line 2 of the referring physician address.

element.name: AddressLine3
element.documentation: The street address, line 3 of the referring physician address.

element.name: AddressLine4
element.documentation: The street address, line 4 of the referring physician address.

element.name: City
element.documentation: The city of the referring physician address.

element.name: StateProvince
element.documentation: The state of the referring physician address.

element.name: PostalCode
element.documentation: The state of the referring physician address.

element.name: CountyRegion
element.documentation: The County or Region of the referring physician address.

element.name: District
element.documentation: The district of the referring physician address.

element.name: Country
element.documentation: The Country of the referring physician address.

element.name: AuthorizationNumber
element.documentation: The authorization number for this coverage.

element.name: AuthorizationDateTime
element.documentation: The authorization date and time for this coverage.

element.name: AuthorizingPerson
element.documentation: The name of the person who authorized services for this coverage.

element.name: AuthorizationVerificationDateTime
element.documentation: TThe date and time when authorization was obtained.

element.name: MedicalAssistanceCardNumber
element.documentation: The medical assistance card number.

element.name: MedicalAssistance
element.documentation: The medical assistance code.

element.name: MedicalAssistanceStatus
element.documentation: The medical assistance code.

element.name: MedicalAssistanceCoverage
element.documentation: The medical assistance coverage code.

element.name: VaProgram
element.documentation: Indicates if the coverage is for a Veterans' Administration program.

element.name: LastCoverageUpdateDateTime
element.documentation: Date and time of the last coverage update.

element.name: ManagedCareProgram
element.documentation: Indicates whether the coverage is for a managed care program.

element.name: ManagedCarePrimaryProvider
element.documentation: The primary provider for a managed care coverage.

element.name: ManagedCareAuthorizationNumber
element.documentation: TThe authorization number for a managed care coverage.

element.name: ManagedCareAuthorizationPhoneNumber
element.documentation: TThe authorization phone number for a managed care coverage.

element.name: CoverageType
element.documentation: The type of coverage.

element.name: CoverageSubscriberHasMedicare
element.documentation: Indicates whether the coverage subscriber also has Medicare.

element.name: MajorMedicalCoverage
element.documentation: Indicates whether the patient has Major Medical coverage.

element.name: MedicaidGroupNumberSuffix
element.documentation: The two letters at the end of the recipient number on the Medicaid card.

element.name: ChampusTricareRank
element.documentation: The CHAMPUS/Tricare rank.

element.name: ChampusTricareGrade
element.documentation: The CHAMPUS/Tricare grade.

element.name: BlueCrossBlueShieldContractAccountName
element.documentation: The contract account name on a Blue Cross/Blue Shield insurance card.

element.name: PrimaryProviderPhoneNumber
element.documentation: The phone number for the primary provider.

element.name: PrimaryProviderAuthorizationContactPerson
element.documentation: The person who provided authorization information for this visit.

element.name: AuthorizationComments
element.documentation: Comments regarding authorization or denial.

element.name: PmpAuthorizationForVisit
element.documentation: The PMP authorization for this visit.

element.name: AuthorizationEntryPerson
element.documentation: The person who entered the authorization number for this managed care coverage.

element.name: ManagedCareRrSubscriberNumber
element.documentation: The RR subscriber number for this managed care coverage.

element.name: ReciprocityNumber
element.documentation: The reciprocity number for this coverage.

element.name: TherapyType
element.documentation: The therapy type for this coverage.

element.name: TherapyPlanDate
element.documentation: The date when the therapy plan was established.

element.name: TherapyStartDate
element.documentation: The date when the therapy started.

element.name: LastMenstrualDate
element.documentation: The patient's last menstrual date.

element.name: AuthorizationValidDate
element.documentation: The date when the authorization became valid.

element.name: AuthorizationInvalidDate
element.documentation: The date when the authorization became invalid.

element.name: CommercialAuthorizationNumber
element.documentation: The commercial authorization number.

element.name: CommercialAuthorizationPerson
element.documentation: The person who authorized the commercial coverage.

element.name: ManagedCareCobraStatus
element.documentation: Indicated whether a managed care coverage has COBRA status.

element.name: ManagedCareCobraStatusDate
element.documentation: The date when a managed care coverage got COBRA status.

element.name: PremiumBillingAccountCreated
element.documentation: Indicates whether a premium billing account was created for this coverage.

element.name: AlternateCoverageOrganization
element.documentation: The alternate name of the organization to which claims submitted under this coverage can be sent.

group.name: AlternateCoverageAddress
group.elementOrder: AddressLine1, AddressLine2, AddressLine3, AddressLine4, City, StateProvince, PostalCode, CountyRegion, District, Country
group.documentation: Collection used for communicating the coverage plan address.

element.name: AddressLine1
element.documentation: The alternate street address, line 1 to which claims submitted under this coverage can be sent. When referencing an institution, this first component is used to specify the institution name. When used in connection with a person, this component specifies the first line of the address.

element.name: AddressLine2
element.documentation: The alternate street address, line 2 to which claims submitted under this coverage can be sent. In general, line 2 qualifies address. Examples: Suite 555 or Fourth Floor. When referencing an institution, this component specifies the street address.

element.name: AddressLine3
element.documentation: The alternate street address, line 3 to which claims submitted under this coverage can be sent. This field specifies the name of the person or organization that should appear as part of the address. This is also known as the "Care of" or "C/O" line.

element.name: AddressLine4
element.documentation: The alternate street address, line 4 to which claims submitted under this coverage can be sent.

element.name: City
element.documentation: The alternate city to which claims submitted under this coverage can be sent.

element.name: StateProvince
element.documentation: The alternate state to which claims submitted under this coverage can be sent. State or province should be represented by the official postal service codes for that country.

element.name: PostalCode
element.documentation: The alternate ZIP code to which claims submitted under this coverage can be sent. Zip or postal codes should be represented by the official codes for that country. In the US, the zip code takes the form 99999[-9999], while the Canadian postal code takes the form A9A9A9, and the Australian Postcode takes the form 9999.

element.name: CountyRegion
element.documentation: The alternate county to which claims submitted under this coverage can be sent.

element.name: District
element.documentation: The alternate district to which claims submitted under this coverage can be sent.

element.name: Country
element.documentation: The alternate country to which claims submitted under this coverage can be sent. The 3-character (alphabetic) form of ISO 3166 should be used for the country code.

element.name: GroupCopayDocument
element.documentation: Subscriber for Group Copay Document information.

idsSpecification.name: GroupCopayDocument
idsSpecification.elementOrder: EcdCategoryName, CopayCategory, Department, CopayAmount, CoinsuranceAmount, LineCount

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: ExtendedAttributes, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsSpecification.documentation: Use this structure to feed Group Copay Document information.

element.name: EcdCategoryName
element.documentation: Displays ECD Copay Category name

element.name: CopayCategory
element.documentation: Indicate the copay category specialty for which you want to establish a different copay/coinsurance amount. For details on the logic that POS or the Benefits Engine uses to determine the copay/coinsurance amount, please consult the help text of the "Default Copay Amount" or "Default Coinsurance Amount" items.

element.name: Department
element.documentation: Indicate the department specialty for which you want to establish a different copay/coinsurance amount. For details on the logic that POS or the Benefits Engine uses to determine the copay/coinsurance amount, please consult the help text of the "Default Copay Amount" or "Default Coinsurance Amount" items.

element.name: CopayAmount
element.documentation: Indicate the copay amount for the corresponding department specialty and/or copay category. For details on the logic that POS or the Benefits Engine uses to determine the copay/coinsurance amount, please consult the help text of the "Default Copay Amount" or "Default Coinsurance Amount" items.

element.name: CoinsuranceAmount
element.documentation: Indicate the coinsurance amount for the corresponding department specialty and/or copay category. For details on the logic that POS or the Benefits Engine uses to determine the copay/coinsurance amount, please consult the help text of the "Default Copay Amount" or "Default Coinsurance Amount" items.

element.name: LineCount
element.documentation: The Line Count

list.name: MemberCoverageRecords
list.documentation: Use this collection to specify Member Coverage Record information.

idsSpecification.name: MemberCoverageRecord
idsSpecification.elementOrder: CoverageLineNumber, EffectiveDate, TerminationDate, MemberCovered, EligibilityUpdateDate, RelationshipToSubscriber, TerminationReason, MemberNumber, ApplicationDate, Student, LateEnrollment, MedicareNumber, AlternateCoverageNumber, RelationshipToGuarantor, DependentType, CourtDecree, Custody, EnrollmentReason, VerificationUserId, PayerMemberName, PersonType, VerificationId, VerificationStatus, LastVerificationDate, ScheduledDiscontinuationDate, CarrierId, ClaimId, FacilityId, HomePlan, PlanId, MemberIdFromFile, ProcessorControlNumberOverride, PrescriptionBillingInfo, CoverageSponsor, CoverageEligibilityQuery, CoverageEligibilityFail

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: ExtendedAttributes, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsSpecification.documentation: Use this structure to feed Member Coverage Record information.

element.name: CoverageLineNumber
element.documentation: The line number used to identify each member of a coverage record.

element.name: EffectiveDate
element.documentation: The date on which the coverage goes into effect for the member.

element.name: TerminationDate
element.documentation: The date after which the coverage is no longer in effect for the member and the member becomes ineligible for benefits.

element.name: MemberCovered
element.documentation: The member's covered status for the coverage, such as: - The coverage is verified and in effect - The coverage was invalidated manually. - Pending (not verified, but in effect), - In Question (was verified, but recent carrier information omitted this coverage), - Invalid (never verified, not effective).

element.name: EligibilityUpdateDate
element.documentation: The date the coverage record was last updated through an eligibility load.

element.name: RelationshipToSubscriber
element.documentation: The category value associated with the relationship of the member to the subscriber of the coverage, such as Self or Spouse.

element.name: TerminationReason
element.documentation: The category value assigned to the explanation for termination of this member's coverage.

element.name: MemberNumber
element.documentation: The identification number assigned to the member for the coverage.

element.name: ApplicationDate
element.documentation: The date on which the member applied for coverage.

element.name: Student
element.documentation: If the member is a full time student this column contains the value 'Y'. If the member is not a full time student, this column contains the value 'N'.

element.name: LateEnrollment
element.documentation: If the member applied for coverage after open enrollment, this column contains the value 'Y'. If the member did not apply for the coverage after the open enrollment period, this column contains the value 'N'.

element.name: MedicareNumber
element.documentation: The member's Medicare-assigned identification number, if applicable.

element.name: AlternateCoverageNumber
element.documentation: Alternate Coverage Record Number for the member

element.name: RelationshipToGuarantor
element.documentation: The category value associated with the relationship of the member to the guarantor

element.name: DependentType
element.documentation: For members whose relationship to the subscriber is unclear, this column specifies how the member is covered by the subscriber.

element.name: CourtDecree
element.documentation: For members that are children involved in divorce scenarios, if a court has decreed exactly which of the parents is responsible for the child's medical expenses, then this column specifies how this subscriber is involved in that court decree.

element.name: Custody
element.documentation: For members that are children involved in divorce scenarios, this column specifies what type of custody the subscriber has over the child member.

element.name: EnrollmentReason
element.documentation: The category value stores the enrollment reason of this member's coverage.

element.name: VerificationUserId
element.documentation: The user ID of the user who last verified this member's status.

element.name: PayerMemberName
element.documentation: Stores the coverage member name from the payer

element.name: PersonType
element.documentation: This contains the person code for a member ID on a coverage.

element.name: VerificationId
element.documentation: The verification record for the coverage member.

element.name: VerificationStatus
element.documentation: The verification status of the coverage, such as verified, changed, elapsed, etc.

element.name: LastVerificationDate
element.documentation: The date the member on the coverage was last verified.

element.name: ScheduledDiscontinuationDate
element.documentation: The member scheduled discontinuation date.

element.name: CarrierId
element.documentation: Used for prescription adjudication in ambulatory pharmacy. Carrier code assigned in Workers Compensation Program(327-CR).

element.name: ClaimId
element.documentation: Used for prescription adjudication in ambulatory pharmacy. Identifies the claim number assigned by Workers Compensation Program (435-DZ).

element.name: FacilityId
element.documentation: Used for prescription adjudication in ambulatory pharmacy. ID assigned to the patient's clinic/host party (336-8C).

element.name: HomePlan
element.documentation: Used for prescription adjudication in ambulatory pharmacy. Code identifying the Blue Cross or Blue Shield plan ID which indicates where the member's coverage has been designated. Usually where the member lives or purchased their coverage (314-CE).

element.name: PlanId
element.documentation: Used for prescription adjudication in ambulatory pharmacy. Assigned by the processor to identify a set of parameters, benefits, or coverage criteria used to adjudicate a claim (524-FO).

element.name: MemberIdFromFile
element.documentation: Member ID received on the source file for the member on the coverage.

element.name: ProcessorControlNumberOverride
element.documentation: Enter the processor control number (PCN) for this member. This PCN overrides the PCN at the plan or payer level for this member only.

element.name: PrescriptionBillingInfo
element.documentation: Contains the default prescription billing information on this coverage like default values to send during claim adjudication.

element.name: CoverageSponsor
element.documentation: Subscriber for Coverage Sponsor information.

idsSpecification.name: CoverageSponsor
idsSpecification.elementOrder: SponsorName, EffectiveDate, TerminationDate, CoverageLineCount, CoveredThrough, EmployerSize

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: ExtendedAttributes, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsSpecification.documentation: Use this structure to feed Coverage Sponsor information.

element.name: SponsorName
element.documentation: The name of the sponsor.

element.name: EffectiveDate
element.documentation: EffectiveDate and TerminationDate are tracked over time since they can affect filing order and MSP logic. When either of those items are changed, a new line is added to this related group using today's date for this item and the new values for the other two items.

element.name: TerminationDate
element.documentation: EffectiveDate and TerminationDate are tracked over time since they can affect filing order and MSP logic. When either of those items are changed, a new line is added to this related group, and the previous line is given yesterday's date as the termination date.

element.name: CoverageLineCount
element.documentation: The Line Count

element.name: CoveredThrough
element.documentation: Covered through current employment, retirement, COBRA, or other. Affects filing order calculation and is used for Medicare Secondary payer.

element.name: EmployerSize
element.documentation: Number of employees for the employer that sponsors this coverage. Used as part of Medicare Secondary payer determination

element.name: CoverageEligibilityQuery
element.documentation: Subscriber for Coverage Eligibility Query information.

idsSpecification.name: CoverageEligibilityQuery
idsSpecification.elementOrder: MessageSentDateTime, ResponseReceivedDateTime, ResponseId, ResponseFiled, HgenGlobalIndex, QueryServiceDate, AssociatedEligibilityInformation

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: ExtendedAttributes, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsSpecification.documentation: Use this structure to feed Coverage Eligibility Failure information.

element.name: MessageSentDateTime
element.documentation: Time an eligibility message was sent in instance format.

element.name: ResponseReceivedDateTime
element.documentation: Time an eligibility response was received in instance format.

element.name: ResponseId
element.documentation: Link to HNO record of the response text. Packed version of CVG 8530 RESPONSE TEXT

element.name: ResponseFiled
element.documentation: Flag if the response data was filed. Packed version of CVG 8540 RESPONSE FILED?

element.name: HgenGlobalIndex
element.documentation: Index to HGEN global for message info. Packed version of CVG 8550 HGEN INDEX

element.name: QueryServiceDate
element.documentation: Record of the service date queried.

element.name: AssociatedEligibilityInformation
element.documentation: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

element.name: CoverageEligibilityFail
element.documentation: Subscriber for Coverage Eligibility Fail information.

idsSpecification.name: CoverageEligibilityFail

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: ExtendedAttributes, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsSpecification.documentation: Use this structure to feed Coverage Eligibility Failure information.

element.name: ElectronicFailureDateTime
element.documentation: Shows time of last failed attempt to verify coverage electronically

element.name: FailureReason
element.documentation: Shows reason for last failed attempt to verify coverage electronically

element.name: FailedDatabase
element.documentation: Shows database of item causing failed attempt to verify coverage electronically

element.name: FailedItem
element.documentation: Shows item causing failure to verify coverage electronically

element.name: AssociatedEligibilityInformation
element.documentation: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

list.name: SubscriberEmployments
list.documentation: Use this collection to specify Subscriber Employment information.

idsSpecification.name: SubscriberEmployment

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: ExtendedAttributes, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsSpecification.documentation: Use this structure to feed Subscriber Employment information

element.name: EmploymentDate
element.documentation: The date on which the subscriber began working for the employer associated with the employer group.

element.name: EmployerId
element.documentation: This is the unique ID of the employer of the patient subsribing to the coverage if EAF 6410 is set to 1. This is free text if EAF 6410 is set to 2.

element.name: EmploymentStatus
element.documentation: The employment status of the subscriber's employer on a coverage (i.e. full, part, etc.).

group.name: Address
group.elementOrder: AddressLine1, AddressLine2, AddressLine3, AddressLine4, City, StateProvince, PostalCode, CountyRegion, District, Country
group.documentation: Collection used for communicating the employer's address on a coverage.

element.name: AddressLine1
element.documentation: The first line of the subscriber's employer's address on a coverage. When referencing an institution, this first component is used to specify the institution name. When used in connection with a person, this component specifies the first line of the address.

element.name: AddressLine2
element.documentation: The second line of the subscriber's employer's address on a coverage. In general, line 2 qualifies address. Examples: Suite 555 or Fourth Floor. When referencing an institution, this component specifies the street address.

element.name: AddressLine3
element.documentation: The third line of the subscriber's employer's address on a coverage. This field specifies the name of the person or organization that should appear as part of the address. This is also known as the "Care of" or "C/O" line.

element.name: AddressLine4
element.documentation: The fourth line of the subscriber's employer's address on a coverage.

element.name: City
element.documentation: The City field of the subscriber's employer's address on the coverage.

element.name: StateProvince
element.documentation: The state of the subscriber's employer's address on a coverage. State or province should be represented by the official postal service codes for that country.

element.name: PostalCode
element.documentation: The zip code of the subscriber's employer's address on a coverage Zip or postal codes should be represented by the official codes for that country. In the US, the zip code takes the form 99999[-9999], while the Canadian postal code takes the form A9A9A9, and the Australian Postcode takes the form 9999.

element.name: CountyRegion
element.documentation: The county of the subscriber's employer's address on a coverage

element.name: District
element.documentation: he district of the subscriber's employer's address on a coverage

element.name: Country
element.documentation: The category number for the country of the subscriber's employer. The 3-character (alphabetic) form of ISO 3166 should be used for the country code.

element.name: PhoneNumber
element.documentation: The phone number of the subscriber's employer on a coverage.
